message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a price that I think is fair. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $10000 for the product. How about we meet at $9500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $8200?
I'm not willing to go that low, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle of my minimum and your offer, at $9100?
I'm still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to go up to $8800. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm not willing to go that low, but I'm getting close to my minimum. I'll meet you at $9500, but that's as low as I can go.
I really like the product, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $8500. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm not willing to go that low, but I'm getting close to my minimum. I'll meet you at $9000, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not quite there. I'm willing to go up to $8200. Would you be willing to meet me there?
